thread.title: Toddler, 1, dies after being left in hot car outside South Florida home in 27C temperatures
thread.title_full: Toddler, 1, dies after being left in hot car outside South Florida home in 27C temperatures

author: ccharlton
title: Toddler, 1, dies after being left in hot car outside South Florida home in 27C temperatures

organizations.name: florida department of children and families

text:
CAR DEATH TRAGEDY Toddler, 1, dies after being left in hot car outside South Florida home in 27C temperatures 
Samuel J. Schnall died on Monday after he was discovered in the vehicle and rushed to hospital in critical condition By COREY CHARLTON Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments A TODDLER has died after being left for more than an hour in a hot car in 27C temperatures outside a home in South Florida. 
Miami-Dade police said Samuel J. Schnall, who turned 1 on January 20, died at a hospital after he was found inside the car in a critical condition on Monday. WPLG The one-year-old toddler died after being left in a car outside a home in South Florida WPLG 3 Cops gather outside the house where youngster Samuel J Schnall died 
News outlets quote investigators as saying a family member was watching the child and had been “out and about” during the day. 
But when the family member came home, the child was left inside the car. The child didn’t live at the home in Pinecrest, located south of Miami. 
Temperatures were around 27C that afternoon in Miami. related stories HE COULD HAVE BEEN SAVED Doctors MISSED bruises on tragic tot weeks before he was shaken to death by his mum's brute boyfriend LITTLE THEO'S GIFT OF LIFE Tragic tot's parents reveal their pride after his lungs saved another baby's life - and he could save more 'I'LL KEEP UP FIGHT FOR TRUTH' Ben Needham's sister vows to keep searching for tragic tot during TV appearance KISS OF DEATH Evil child killers who murdered tragic tot Liam Fee 'spotted snogging in the street during day out from jail' 'GOOD NIGHT I LOVE YOU' Tragic tot's heartbreaking final words to mum before he died in his sleep HORRIFIC LIFE OF DEFENCELESS ELLIE Evil dad Ben Butler subjected his defenceless daughter to years of merciless abuse before battering her to death 
It was not clear who found the child, or whether charges would be filed. 
Jennifer Capote, from Miami-Dade police, said: “This is an unfortunate situation for every family member involved, as well as the police department,” Local 10 reported. 
She added: “There could be a time when you are taking care of somebody else’s child and you don’t realize – because it’s not the norm for you – to maybe get out of your vehicle and check your vehicle, to make sure that we check that all of the children are out of the car” Pinecrest Patch reported. WPLG 3 Cops said the child was left in the car after being “out and about” with a family member 
A spokesperson for the Florida Department of Children and Families also said it was opening an investigation into the child’s death. 
“We are devastated to hear that the child passed away today and will continue to investigate and assist the family in any way possible as they grieve this loss. 
“That family has no prior involvement with the welfare system.” A toddler has died after being left i n a hot car outside a South Florida home
